Tic Tac Toe Instructions:

 1. The game is played on a grid of 3x3.

 2. Players take turns placing their mark (X or O) on the grid.

 3. The first player to get 3 of their marks in a row (horizontally, vertically, or diagonally) wins the game.

 4. If all 9 squares are filled and no player has 3 in a row, the game is a draw.

 5. Have fun!
